overview: Some lessons in life are harder than others – and nowhere is this truism more evident than at the STAXUS Academy, where some of the hottest, horniest young lads get the education of a lifetime in the art of sucking cock and fucking ass! Guided by the experienced hands of sex-maestro Sam Williams, this band of eager students (Darko Simic, Richie Hajek and Alan Benfelen included) take every lesson – not to mention every dick! – to heart. The result? A hardcore curriculum of raw, uncut phalluses and copious amounts of thick, sticky spunk!
title: RAW Lessons
